caption:
“Fasting is the body’s hymn to heaven.”

Reflection:
The empty plate becomes an altar. In hunger, the spirit learns to sing. Every pang becomes praise.

Commentary:
This poetic image turns fasting into worship — a discipline that transforms longing into devotion and appetite into adoration.
